name: Towns N Warriors
description:
Controls:

  • Credits - start game)
  • In-game controls:
    • LMB on your city - select city
    • RMB on any city - send troops
    • CTRL+A - select all your cities
    • CTRL+A(second time) - unselect all your cities
    • CTRL+[0..9] - create city group
    • SHIFT+[0..9] - add to group
    • [0..9] - choose group
